SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.example.platformerplain.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.platformerplain.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Controls the game logic and interactions.

The GameController class handles the core functionality of the game, including player input, game updates, collision detection, and managing various game entities like the player, eagle, and fireballs.

      The animation timer for updating the game loop.

      Responsible for continuously updating the game loop.

      The pattern of platforms of the levels in the game.
